attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current British parliament has been involved in the scandal of MPs expenses.

Both parliament and the current British government have therefore lost the trust and respect of the people of the UK. Therefore I am respectfully requesting Mr Brown to do the right and honourable thing and that is to use the powers vested in him to dissolve Parliament so that a General Election must be held, which will allow the will of the people to be shown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
